title: STUNNING BOUTIQUE CONDO MARQUIZ!!
posting_body: ['Stunning 2/2.5 unit in a boutique hotel condominium, the Marquis Residences.', 'Best location in downtown Miami.', 'Walking distance to FTX Arena, Adrienne Arsht Center, and across the street from the Perez Art Museum, Frost Science Center.', 'Easy access to South Beach, Brickell, Wynwood, and Design District.', 'Private, double-elevator entry leads to this custom-finished unit featuring an expansive balcony off of the living room and master suite, overlooking Maurice Ferre Park, Biscayne Bay, and South Beach.', 'Access to hotel/residence amenities- a full-service pool deck, restaurant, bar, jacuzzi and cold plunge, fully equipped gym, children’s playroom, yoga room and spa.', 'One assigned parking space.', 'This unit is for those with discerning taste and eye for design in a full-service luxury building.', 'all units are one year lease min!', 'credit score close to 700 or higher required, proof of income 2,5 greater than rent price, first month + last month + security deposit to move in!', 'Dilya Taveras', 'Equity Realty', 'TEXT :', 'show contact info']
